title: Rainy night city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a rainy night in a city street with many other vehicles and pedestrians.

description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are many other vehicles and pedestrians around. The traffic lights are visible in the distance, and the ego vehicle is following the traffic rules. The weather is rainy, and the visibility is moderate.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to ensure safety on the wet road. It brakes frequently to avoid collisions with other vehicles or pedestrians. The driver is cautious and attentive to the surroundings, adjusting the speed and direction according to the traffic conditions.
